docs.title: Introduction
Welcome to the IDS FAIR Application Profile

docs.text: Dataset Title This property contains a name given to the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name. URI Range Card dct:title rdfs:Literal 1..n RDF Examples Turtle @ prefix dct : <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> . <https://piveau.eu/set/data/test-dataset> dct : title "DCAT-AP 2 Example Dataset 2" @ en . RDF/XML <rdf:RDF xmlns:dct= "http://purl.org/dc/terms/" > <rdf:Description rdf:about= "https://piveau.eu/set/data/test-dataset" > <dct:title xml:lang= "en" > DCAT-AP 2 Example Dataset 2 </dct:title> </rdf:Description> </rdf:RDF> JSON-LD [ { "@id" : "https://piveau.eu/set/data/test-dataset" , "http://purl.org/dc/terms/title" : [ { "@value" : "DCAT-AP 2 Example Dataset 2" , "@language" : "en" } ] } ] N-Triples <https://piveau.eu/set/data/test-dataset> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "DCAT-AP 2 Example Dataset 2" @ en . Frontend Representation DCAT-AP 2 Example Dataset 2 Spatial / Geographical Coverage
